sphinx-rtd-jupyter¶

Ths is a lightweight extension of the excellent sphinx_rtd_theme theme for Sphinx, for use with the JupyterHub projects.

This is a demo for the changes we make to the sphinx_rtd_theme theme. If any new changes are added, we can preview them here. Anything that’s not explicitly demoed should be assumed to be the same as the sphinx_rtd_theme theme.

Modifying the sidebar and body captions¶

We often use the toctree “caption” argument to add a small caption header to toc lists. This adds a section break in the side bar as well as a short header above the TOC. We’d like these to look more like “titles” instead of in-line captions.

This is the first caption

  • A second page
    • Heading 2
      • Heading 3
  • A third page with an even longer title I wonder how this looks with the buttons
    • Heading 2
      • Heading 3

And now, the second caption

  • foo
  • bar
